entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
